title.value: Создание инфекционных фонов с учетом конкурентных взаимоотношений патогенов зерновых культур и бобовых трав
Creation of infectious backgrounds taking into account the competitive pathogens relations of grain crops and leguminous grasses

journal.title: Agriculture and Plant Protection : scientific-practical journal

person.name: Ermolenko, N.L., National Academy of Sciences (Belarus). Scientific and Practical Center for  Arable Farming

abstract.value: The results of laboratory studies on the relationships between such pathogens, as Bipolaris sorokiniana, Alternaria alternata, Pyrenophora teres and Fusarium culmorum (causative agents of barley diseases), as well as Sclerotinia trifoliorum and fungi species of genus Fusarium, parasitizing on perennial clover are presented in the paper. On pure cultures of fungi it is showed that in the conditions of cocultivation relationships between the pathogens are based mainly on the type of antagonism. Temperature plays a significant role: its changes influence the competitive ability of the pathogens. When inoculating plants it must be taken into account their interaction in order to avoid reduction of pathogen aggressiveness and distortion of the results of evaluation of breeding material for resistance to diseases.
